data.title: Much More Than A Coney Dog Place.
data.text: One of our favorite when we are in the area.  Recently remodeled, Joe's Top Dog is an attractive place to dine with delicious food and reasonable prices.  On this visit, I had the Ruben and chili fries for my lunch and the wife had the western omelette for her breakfast. It was the individual fares we had a taste for and our tastes were completely fulfilled.  The wife was extremely satisfied with her omelette, it's surprising how many restaurants do omelette bad but Joe's know how to do them right.  One of the pleasant surprises I had here in the past was how good their Sauteed Perch is when Joe cooks it for dinner.

data.title: Two coneys with everything including music
data.text:
This classic Dearborn hot dog joint is bustling with crowds buying tens of thousands of coneys and French fries every week. 

On Friday nights, though, the dogs take a back seat to somebody the best jazz music in the motor city 

The Rich Michaels Trio backs the Midwest's top jazz artists for a solid three hour show from 7-10 PM, and h food, the drink and the crowds transform the diner into an early after-hours Jazz joint.  And you never know who will show up and join the band. 

The Friday food fare is phenomenal  the service is excellent. And the live music makes everything that much better

data.title: Wednesday Secret:
data.text:
Everyone in the area knows,Top Dog Wednesday special.$1.00 Coney's!
Inside has tables,no booths,sports TV,also has a Bar. Family own (Joe,owner),
has some nostalgic pictures,such as Michigan Panthers football team,wth?
Just a cool,local neat,cheap place for Coney's On Wed.,did I mention there 
pretty Good to!

data.title: Locals make this place!
data.text: During breakfast and lunch this is a traditional Metro Detroit Coney Island.  At night it is a bar with live music most Friday nights.  If you visit more than twice you have local status and are subject to good natured ribbing and joking.  The food is good, reasonably priced and served with a smile and a laugh.

data.title: The best coney island in town!
data.text: Many out-staters don't know what a coney dog is or should be!  Joe's is the epitome of what a coney should look and taste like.  A quick tip, Wednesdays is the coney special!  Eat a bunch!!!

data.title: Hole in the Wall but the best food!
data.text: This has to be one of the best hole-in-the-wall places in the Dearborn area!  They serve quality diner/pub food and the best coney dogs in the area.  Their meat is from Dearborn Ham (a local meat processor), which makes the coneys taste amazing!  If you want a great meal at a great price this is the place to go!

data.title: Delicious food and friendly service
data.text: Excellent food. My Coney was delicious. Prices are very reasonable. The waitresses were incredibly friendly and welcoming to my family.  We had a great meal.
